ssot__LoyaltyJournalSubtype__dlm.name: Loyalty Journal Subtype
ssot__LoyaltyJournalSubtype__dlm.description: The Loyalty Journal Subtype DMO represents a subtype of a loyalty journal type, such as a watched video or product review.
